titleStmt.title: The French herald summoning all true Christian princes to a generall croisade, for a holy warr against the great enemy of Christendome, and all his slaues. Vpon the occasion of the most execrable murther of Henry the great. To the Prince.
titleStmt.author: Loiseau de Tourval, Jean.
Marcelline, George, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Allde for Mathew Lownes, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bishops head in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Signed with a Maltese cross within a triangle, i.e. Jean Loiseau de Tourval.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
